maml:description.maml:para: Get-AzureSiteRecoveryRecoveryPlanFile download the recovery plan in an XML format. This file can be updated and used to upload the updated Recovery Plan.
Path to store the recovery plan xml file
Path to store the recovery plan xml file
Path to store the recovery plan xml file
Get information about Azure Site Recovery Server for current Azure Site Recovery vault

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-AzureSiteRecoveryServer
ID : 57f95c35-6c83-42ce-bb21-2c4f10f92d8d Name : hv2.corp.microsoft.com LastHeartbeat : 9/22/2014 1:08:43 AM ProviderVersion : 3.4.137.0 ServerVersion : 3.2.7510.0

maml:description.maml:para: Get information about Virtual Machines managed in Azure Site Recovery

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-AzureSiteRecoveryVM -ProtectionContainer $protectionContainer
ID : aa9dfc3a-a6f7-4550-a59c-4d9da0e19edb ServerId : 57f95c35-6c83-42ce-bb21-2c4f10f92d8e ProtectionContainerId : 57f95c35-6c83-42ce-bb21-2c4f10f92d8e_f0982c81-dfb1-4bfa-ba0d-a7d941f6e8c7 Name : PrimaryToAzure Type : VirtualMachine FabricObjectId : 1986FDA5-6480-4860-9C24-0F1564437D70 Protected : False CanCommit : False CanFailover : False CanReverseReplicate : False ActiveLocation : Primary ProtectionState : Enabling Protection ReplicationHealth : TestFailoverState : None ReplicationProvider : HyperVReplicaAzure

maml:description.maml:para: Get information of the Recovery Plan for current Azure Site Recovery Vault

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-AzureSiteRecoveryRecoveryPlan
ID Name ServerId TargetServerId -- ---- -------- -------------- 4ac79494-e278-4ec2-b967-7f... rp1 57f95c35-6c83-42ce-bb21-2c... 21a9403c-6ec1-44f2-b744-b4... c70edca8-4910-48c6-94e7-3b... rp2 57f95c35-6c83-42ce-bb21-2c... 21a9403c-6ec1-44f2-b744-b4...

maml:description.maml:para: Get the information of the operation for current Azure Site Recovery Vault
Takes datetime as input. Allows to filter the list of jobs started after the given starttime

Take string input for possible states of ASR Job. Use this parameter to get filtered view of Jobs. Possible states include: Aborted, Cancelled, Cancelling, Completed, Failed, InProgress, PartiallySucceeded, CompletedWithInformation, RolledBack, Skipped, Waiting, WaitingForFinalizeProtection, WaitingForManualAction, WaitingForStopTestFailover, WaitingForUserInputAfterDataSync, NotStarted, Unknown.
Takes datetime as input. Allows to filter the list of jobs started after the given starttime

Take string input for possible states of ASR Job. Use this parameter to get filtered view of Jobs. Possible states include: Aborted, Cancelled, Cancelling, Completed, Failed, InProgress, PartiallySucceeded, CompletedWithInformation, RolledBack, Skipped, Waiting, WaitingForFinalizeProtection, WaitingForManualAction, WaitingForStopTestFailover, WaitingForUserInputAfterDataSync, NotStarted, Unknown.
Get information about Azure site recovery Protection container under current Azure Site Vault

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-AzureSiteRecoveryProtectionContainer
ID : 57f95c35-6c83-42ce-bb21-2c4f10f92d8e_f0982c81-dfb1-4bfa-ba0d-a7d941f6e8c7 FabricObjectId : f0982c81-dfb1-4bfa-ba0d-a7d941f6e8c7 Name : azurecloud ConfigurationStatus : Configured PairedTo : 21a9403c-6ec1-44f2-b744-b4e50b792387_d38048d4-b460-4791-8ece-108395ee8478 Role : Primary ServerId : 57f95c35-6c83-42ce-bb21-2c4f10f92d8e

maml:description.maml:para: Get the list of Protection Entities like "VMs"

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-AzureSiteRecoveryProtectionEntity -ProtectionContainer $protectionContainer
ID : aa9dfc3a-a6f7-4550-a59c-4d9da0e19edb ServerId : 57f95c35-6c83-42ce-bb21-2c4f10f92d8e ProtectionContainerId : 57f95c35-6c83-42ce-bb21-2c4f10f92d8e_f0982c81-dfb1-4bfa-ba0d-a7d941f6e8c7 Name : PrimaryToAzure Type : VirtualMachine FabricObjectId : 1986FDA5-6480-4860-9C24-0F1564437D70 Protected : False CanCommit : False CanFailover : False CanReverseReplicate : False ActiveLocation : Primary ProtectionState : Enabling Protection ReplicationHealth : TestFailoverState : None ReplicationProvider : HyperVReplicaAzure

maml:description.maml:para: Imports a Azure site Recovery Vault Settings file to able to connect to Azure site Recovery Vault
Path to the Azure site Recovery Vault Settings file. This file can be downloaded from Azure Site Recovery Vault portal and stored locally
